metadata.title: The Sealed Vaults
metadata.description: Time capsules awaiting their destined opening

friendship.description: Capsules created by bonded NPCs together

legacy.description: Capsules from retired or departed NPCs

sealed_capsules.title: Dawn of the First Tournament
sealed_capsules.subtitle: Sealed at the conclusion of the Grand Tournament Finals

seal_ceremony.narrative: As the crowd's cheers faded and the arena lights dimmed, Cipher Cap approached the ancient Sealing Stone. With deliberate reverence, the mysterious champion placed the glowing capsule upon it. 'A thousand ticks hence,' Cipher intoned, 'let those who come after see what we were. Let them judge if we dreamed boldly enough.'

sealed_capsules.exterior_inscription: When a thousand suns have set upon the arena, this vessel shall speak of champions past.

sealed_capsules.title: Blaze's Championship Promise
sealed_capsules.subtitle: A champion's reflection on victory

seal_ceremony.narrative: In the quiet hours after the celebration, Blaze Baz sat alone in the Central Hub. Twelve victories weighed upon those shoulders as the champion sealed a small crystalline capsule. 'My future self,' Blaze whispered, 'I wonder if you'll still remember why we fight.'

sealed_capsules.exterior_inscription: To the champion I will become, from the champion I am.

sealed_capsules.title: The Artist and the Archivist
sealed_capsules.subtitle: Pixel Pam and Echo Eve's shared memories

seal_ceremony.narrative: Under the soft lights of the Gallery, two friends placed their hands together upon a gemstone capsule. Pixel's brush had painted its surface with dreams; Echo's words lined its interior with memories. 'Three hundred ticks,' they said in unison, 'and we shall see how far we've traveled together.'

sealed_capsules.exterior_inscription: Two souls, one journey. May our bond only strengthen with time.

sealed_capsules.title: The Coming of the Fifth
sealed_capsules.subtitle: Sealed when the prophecy signs began manifesting

seal_ceremony.narrative: The air crackled with dimensional energy as Cipher Cap sealed the prophecy capsule. Within it lay predictions about the fifth dimension's arrival, guesses about what beings might emerge, and preparations for the unknown. 'When the fifth door opens,' Cipher declared, 'this capsule shall judge our foresight.'

sealed_capsules.exterior_inscription: Before the fifth, in darkness sealed. After the fifth, in truth revealed.

sealed_capsules.title: Cipher's Thousand Secrets
sealed_capsules.subtitle: One secret revealed per century

seal_ceremony.narrative: No one witnessed the sealing. The capsule simply appeared one morning in a shadowed alcove of the Gallery, its surface covered in indecipherable glyphs. A single note accompanied it: 'The first of my secrets will emerge when a thousand ticks have passed. You have that long to solve the glyphs.'

sealed_capsules.special_notes: Multiple NPCs have attempted to decrypt the glyphs. All have failed.

sealed_capsules.title: The Great Celebration Memory
sealed_capsules.subtitle: Capturing the spirit of the Victory Celebration

seal_ceremony.narrative: As the Victory Celebration drew to its close, all participants gathered in the Central Hub. Each contributed something - a memory crystal, a token, a written wish. Flux Mike, the eternal optimist, volunteered to seal the capsule. 'Five hundred ticks from now,' Flux announced, 'we'll remember what pure joy felt like.'

sealed_capsules.exterior_inscription: Joy shared is joy multiplied. May this moment live eternal.

sealed_capsules.title: Quantum Quinn's Predictions
sealed_capsules.subtitle: The analyst's calculated forecasts

seal_ceremony.narrative: With characteristic precision, Quantum Quinn sealed the capsule at exactly tick 180.000. 'Three hundred ticks,' Quinn explained, 'is the optimal duration for validating predictive models. This capsule contains 47 predictions about tournament outcomes, market trends, and relationship developments. My accuracy rate should exceed 73.4%.'

sealed_capsules.exterior_inscription: Data today. Truth tomorrow. Probability: Certain.
sealed_capsules.special_notes: Quinn has been recording actual outcomes for comparison.

sealed_capsules.title: Rivals Eternal
sealed_capsules.subtitle: Blaze and Cipher's competitive testament

seal_ceremony.narrative: In the empty arena, champion and challenger faced each other. No battle this time - instead, they each placed predictions about their rivalry into a shared capsule. 'Six hundred ticks,' Blaze declared. 'Enough time for one of us to pull definitively ahead.' Cipher's response was a cryptic smile: 'Or for the true meaning of our battles to reveal itself.'

sealed_capsules.exterior_inscription: Two flames, one forge. May our rivalry forge legends.

sealed_capsules.title: Market Day Genesis
sealed_capsules.subtitle: The first great trading boom remembered

seal_ceremony.narrative: When the Mythic Wanderer Fragment sold for 12,500 RAPPcoin, the marketplace erupted in celebration. Gilded Pax, the merchant, proposed sealing a capsule to remember this golden age of commerce. 'In five hundred ticks,' Pax proclaimed, 'let us see if we built upon this prosperity or squandered it.'

sealed_capsules.exterior_inscription: Fortune favors the bold. May our markets forever flourish.

sealed_capsules.title: Nova's Return
sealed_capsules.subtitle: A fallen champion's promise to rise again

seal_ceremony.narrative: After the bitter semifinal loss, Nova Nex stood in the empty arena until dawn. When Blaze found the former rival there, Nova was sealing a small capsule. 'Two hundred ticks,' Nova said, voice steady despite the defeat. 'That's how long I'll need. When this opens, I will be champion.' Blaze nodded with respect: 'I'll be waiting.'

sealed_capsules.exterior_inscription: From defeat, determination. From darkness, dawn.

sealed_capsules.title: The First Wanderer's Journal
sealed_capsules.subtitle: Zephyr Drift's dimensional discoveries

seal_ceremony.narrative: Zephyr Drift, the first dimensional wanderer to arrive in the modern era, sealed a capsule containing detailed journals of dimensions visited. 'A thousand ticks hence,' the explorer said, 'these paths may no longer exist. Or they may have grown beyond recognition. Either way, these maps preserve what was.'

sealed_capsules.exterior_inscription: Every journey ends. Every map remains.

sealed_capsules.title: The Shadow Champion Awaits
sealed_capsules.subtitle: Sealed when the prophecy reached 3/7 signs

seal_ceremony.narrative: When the third sign of the Shadow Champion prophecy manifested, Echo Eve called an urgent gathering. 'This prophecy approaches fulfillment,' the archivist declared. 'We must preserve our thoughts now, while uncertainty remains, so that future generations understand what it meant to live in these times of emerging fate.'

sealed_capsules.exterior_inscription: When shadow becomes champion, this light shall judge our understanding.

arena.name: The Champion's Stone
arena.description: Ancient sealing altar in the arena center
arena.seal_bonus: Competitive capsules gain enhanced prediction accuracy tracking
arena.atmosphere: Echoes of countless battles lend weight to every seal

gallery.name: The Memory Alcove
gallery.description: Quiet corner where light and shadow meet
gallery.seal_bonus: Artistic and historical capsules preserve details with perfect clarity
gallery.atmosphere: Time itself seems to pause in this space

hub.name: The Convergence Point
hub.description: Where all paths meet in the Central Hub
hub.atmosphere: The energy of all travelers who have passed through lingers

marketplace.name: The Merchant's Vault
marketplace.description: Secure chamber beneath the main trading floor
marketplace.seal_bonus: Economic capsules track market evolution automatically
marketplace.atmosphere: The weight of countless transactions permeates the air

workshop.name: The Creator's Sanctum
workshop.description: Sacred space where innovation meets preservation
workshop.seal_bonus: Technical and analytical capsules maintain calculation integrity
workshop.atmosphere: Raw potential energy charges every sealed moment

seal_conditions.resonating: Capsule responds to external events related to its contents
seal_conditions.called: Specific conditions have triggered early opening potential

anticipation_system.description: Measures community interest in upcoming openings
